doc.after: Moral and ethical development occurs throughout the entirety of the cadet experience by living under the honor code and through formal leadership programs available at the academy These include instruction in the values of the military profession through Professional Military Ethics Education PME2 voluntary religious programs interaction with staff and faculty role models and an extensive guest speaker program The foundation of the ethical code at West Point is found in the academy s motto Duty Honor Country 1
